articles.title: Why is American Airlines canceling flights? Weather, staffing shortages blamed for over 1,500 flight cancelations; some at O'Hare - WLS-TV
articles.description: Why is American Airlines canceling flights? Weather and staffing shortages are to blame for over 1,500 flight cancelations; some were at O'Hare.
articles.content: CHICAGO -- American Airlines canceled nearly 1,300 flights over the weekend, citing weather conditions and staffing shortages as the impetus for the massive travel headache.The Fort Worth-based airli… [+2861 chars]

articles.title: Nigerian court orders interim forfeiture of Obinwanne Okeke's houses, cars - Premium Times
articles.description: Mr Okeke is serving a 10-year prison sentence in America for his involvement in a computer-based intrusion fraud scheme...
articles.content:
A federal court in Lagos on Friday ordered the interim forfeiture of houses and cars linked to convicted cybercriminal Obinwanne Okekealso known as Invictus Obi.

articles.title: Biden's job rating sinks to 42 percent in NBC News poll a year from midterms - NBC News
articles.description: Just nine months into Biden's presidency, 71 percent of Americans say the country is headed in the wrong direction, a new NBC News poll shows.
articles.content: WASHINGTON A majority of Americans now disapprove of President Joe Biden's job performance, while half give him low marks for competence and uniting the country, according to results from the latest … [+6248 chars]
